ygData.subject: RE: Couple Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: OK...so anybody have any STATS on the Kilij?? I haven t seen anything on any of the spoiler sites for it, but I also have no idea what KIND of a weapon it is
ygData.messageBody:
OK...so anybody have any STATS on the Kilij??
I haven't seen anything on any of the spoiler sites for it, but I also have
no idea what KIND of a weapon it is :)
Sean

All that is gold does not glitter,
Not all those who wander are lost.
The old that is strong does not wither,
Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
JRR Tolkien


-----Original Message-----
From: Rick Wood [mailto:eggmanjr@...]
Sent: Friday, September 17, 1999 6:48 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Couple Questions


From: "Rick Wood" <eggmanjr@...>





>
>Second -
>
>Does anyone know of anything about a weapon called the "Kilij" ? I am on
>the quest, and i am looking for 'the plans for the kilij'
>That's what it's called, it's the plans on how the kilij is made, so i can
>take them to the guy who can make them, Any info or anyone selling such an
>item on Cazic Thule would be welcomed.
>
>Rebequa
>18th Rogue
> CT


Yes i do know where the plans come from, can you please send more info to
the list as to where the quest starts from please, at any rate the plans
come off a SG in so ro, hes not named however he is distinguished by being
much lower level than a sg normally is, mid to hight twenties instead of
thirties. Now that i have helped you please help me and tell me where the
quest starts.
